description:
go.text/transform: re-arrange TestReader's test cases so that they can
be re-used by other tests.

messages.text:
Hello mpvl@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

https://code.google.com/p/go.text

be re-used by other tests.

R=mpvl, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10672044

FYI, I've updated my CL to incorporate these changes.
